name: Fishing arcade [TIC-80]
description:
fishing game

no timers

no game over

hi-score grind ftw

ver 1.1: gameplay tweaks, better fish distribution

ver 1.2: clouds, smooth color shift

ver 1.2.1: transparent sprites (I didn't know it was a feature; LOL)

Goal: sink to the bottom of the ocean to get more valuable fish (you can collect more fish when you start pulling harpoon back up)

Controls:

Z - Hide controls

X - Show controls

Left/Right - move ship / harpoon

UP - move harpoon launcher barrel

Down - Shoot harpoon / sink faster
